title: Available Now! Clean 2 Bed 2 Bath Apartment in Emeryville
posting_body: This unit was just re-painted, deep cleaned, and the carpets were steam cleaned.

HIGHLIGHTS: Covered Secured Parking, Gym, Lots of Closet Space, Secure Building, Walkable Distance to BART, Amazing Loft Office Space for Work from Home, Additional Basement Storage, Miele Washer/Dryer, GE Stainless Steel Appliances.
Please reach out to schedule your tour.
Vue 46 is a modern, mid-rise condo building in Emeryville.
Built in 2008, this development has 79 units with features like vaulted ceilings and bay windows.
The contemporary design features a central courtyard, a fully-equipped fitness center, and a media room plus secured parking and on-site storage.
Security is a priority at Vue 46.
Each tenant gets a key fob to access each common area door and a fob to access the entry gate and underground parking garage.
Vue 46 is conveniently located on the Emeryville/Oakland border, close to entertainment, shopping, and dining.
Close proximity to IKEA and Trader Joe and Temescal Park.
Easy access to 80 and 580 freeway and public transportation.
Emery-Go Around shuttle runs from the MacArthur Bart station to Emeryville.
*Two-level loft with lots of natural light throughout the day
*Main level: living room, kitchen, bedroom and bathroom
*Up wood stairs you get a great loft office and your large primary bedroom and bathroom
*Soft carpet throughout, tile in the kitchen
*Chief’s kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances: gas range stove, dishwasher, microwave, and fridge
*Large master bath with double sink vanity and standalone shower; soaking tub in the guest bathroom
* Owner pays for trash, sewer, and water.
* Tenant pays Vue46 move in/move out fees
